product_description: The utilitarian denim jacket is elevated to edgy statement-maker with exaggerated sleeves and twin insets of corset-style lacing down the back.
product_details_and_care:
The utilitarian denim jacket is elevated to edgy statement-maker with exaggerated sleeves and twin insets of corset-style lacing down the back.
